scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u contour_plot -n contour_plot -o build/contour_plot.js -- build/bundle.js && cp build/contour_plot.js .
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/contour_plot.js -c -m -o build/contour_plot.min.js && rm -f build/contour_plot.zip && zip -j build/contour_plot.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/contour_plot.js build/contour_plot.min.js
